name: yoshino-yoi-boilerplate
description: Lightweight setup to create static websites with YOI - the Yoshino frontend component library.
author: yoshino.digital dev team

scripts.postinstall: bower update && npm run prepare-less && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.clean-dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/assets && mkdir dist/assets/css dist/assets/img dist/assets/js
scripts.copy: npm run copy-favicon && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-scripts && npm run copy-fonts
scripts.prepare-less: npm run copy-less-yoi-config && npm run make-less-yoi-config-index && npm run make-less-yoi-core-index && npm run make-less-yoi-utilities-index && npm run make-less-yoi-components-index
scripts.build: npm run clean-dist && npm run build-scripts && npm run build-styles && npm run build-templates && npm run copy
scripts.build-scripts: uglifyjs $(echo 'bower_components/yoshino-yoi/dist/js/yoi.js' ; echo $(cat src/assets/js/yoi-components.txt) ; echo $(find src/assets/js/theme -name '*.js' -exec echo '{}' \;)) --source-map-inline --beautify -o dist/assets/js/scripts.js
scripts.build-styles: npm run styles:compile --source-map-map-inline && npm run styles:process
scripts.publish: npm run clean-dist && npm run publish-scripts && npm run publish-styles && npm run build-templates && npm run copy && npm run styles:reduce
scripts.publish-scripts: uglifyjs $(echo 'bower_components/yoshino-yoi/dist/js/yoi.js' ; echo $(cat src/assets/js/yoi-components.txt) ; echo $(find src/assets/js/theme -name '*.js' -exec echo '{}' \;)) --compress -o dist/assets/js/scripts.js
scripts.publish-styles: npm run styles:compile && npm run styles:process && npm run styles:compress
scripts.watch: npm run watch-scripts & npm run watch-styles & npm run watch-templates
